Cell cycle genes

cell_cycle_genes.Rd

(Human) cell cycle genes for scoring in single cell, please see module_scores_sc() and Tirosh et al, Science (2016). These genes are based on the updated version in Seurat.

Usage

cell_cycle_genes

Format

cell_cycle_genes

A data.table

hgnc_symbol

The (HGNC) gene symbol

ensembl_gene_id

The corresponding ensembl identifiers.

set

To which cell cycle phase the gene belongs

On this page
